item.title: Mary add a quote by C.L. Wilson
item.description: "My beloved is the sun And I am the earth that thrives only in her warmth. My beloved is the rain And I am the grass that thirsts for her quenching kiss. My beloved is the wind And I am the wings that soar when she fills me with her gentle strength. My beloved is the rock Upon which rests the happiness of all my days. â€”The Elements of Love, a poem by Aileron v'En Kavali of the Fey" -- C.L. Wilson

item.title: Mary add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss
